mapper.select: select pdor.pdorSeq, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, deli.deliSeq, deli.deliStausCd, deli.deliRegDate, deli.deliModDate, deli.deliDesc from delivery deli left join productorder pdor ON deli.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY deli.deliSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
Select count(*) From delivery deli left join productorder pdor ON deli.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq WHERE 1=1
